message.body: Hi Sophie, I hope your weekend is going well. I was wondering if you wanted to come over my place for dinner and maybe galavanting around town after for some man-hunting?

Oh!!! I really want to hang out!!!! Don't think I'm a flake but I got really ill last night (food poisoning). I was going to call you last night though! So I don't think I'll be going fAr from my bed today but maybe Tuesday ????
Wanna meet around campus and creep on freshman art kids... I have to be around in the morning.
Or I can come by after my meetings on Tuesday?
Oh gosh, that's horrible!! What did you eat?! I'm so sorry! If you need me to bring you anything, please let me know, I would be happy to.
Oh that's so sweet! I'm ok worst is past just really tired and pissed I couldn't get some work done today(I have homework for my tune up classes). I just gotta sleep it off now.
Aw, well, get better! If your up for it, feel better by Tueaday, I would be happy to creep on the little ones.
Hahahaha
I'm so glad your in the program

Oh and remember the accent of Nuit I believe ascended from her prevention? I've nailed down my roommates accent to be the same... I couldn't wait until Tuesday to tell you. Psyched you are too, nice to connect already.
Hahahaha that's amazing!!!
And she is only 24, one can only imagine what she will sounds like in 10 years!
Oh my god!! Actually I really wanted to tell you a about my fellow DMIer azeem!!!! Oh my god it went so poorly with him. We have major cultural boundaries!
Hahaah
Hopefully her boyfriend doesnt leave her... I feel like people like that need regular 'unwinding'
HahahahahhahHhhha oh god, that was superb!
I was wondering about you two and how it went. I couldn't figure it out based on the presentation.

Interesting. He has only been in America a few days, I don't think he was ready to 1. Make eye contact with me 2. Accept me as not being inferior to him. But I think in a few months, when he has adjusted to the intensity of a pure bred jewish american princess, we may do great stuff together
Ooh WOW, that's heavy, having to accept you as an equal... And of course a full chuckle to accepting you as a princes ;)
I was laughing so hard when he started to put in a Z axis, followed up by 2 others... It was ridiculous, and even funnier how he had no idea of its hilarity.
Oh man! Poor guy.
